interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Women Facial Razor for Hair Removal - Dermaplaning Tool Peach Fuzz Trimmer Womens Fine Hair Remover Eyebrow Razors and Dermaplane Face Shavers Women's Exfoliating for Sensitive Skin Essential Travel Review Date: 2019/07/04 Store: MODEMODE Product Description: ["MODEMODE Women's Facial Razor Home Dermaplaning - Eyebrow Razor For Women Face Peach Fuzz Hair Removal Womens Face Exfoliating At Daily Eyebrow Shaping Tool"] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MODEMODE', 'Number of Blades': '1', 'Unit Count': '5.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MODEMODE'} Review Text: I'v tried several types of products to remove facial hair: coil groomer, tweezers, electric face trimmer, and these. The coil groomer was the most difficult to use. No matter how much I twisted it, I could only get a hair or two after a few tries. Tweezing was faster and more effective. The electric face trimmer was designed for removing all facial hair, including nose and ear hair, so the cutting tip was very small and the cutting mechanism was gentle on delicate skin. It was great at removing the peach fuzz on my cheeks; I just needed to make several swipes to get my whole cheek.

These shavers are well made. Unfortunately, the instructions were all written in either Japanese or Chinese. I figured they looked self explanatory, so I didn't look up videos on how to use them. The cutting tip is long, which should make shaving go faster as it can cover a larger area. However, the larger blade also means that it is more difficult to reach certain areas. I have a lot of small moles on my face, so I made sure to be extra careful while using them. Despite this, I managed to nick myself a few times. What's ironic is that the nicks weren't on any moles.

I think my skin is just too delicate and uneven to use these shavers. Review Title: Not for me Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

The first time I tried it on, some of the bling popped off. It is lightweight, so I don't expect it to last long.

It's hard to tell from their pictures how this is designed. The tines are bent forward before bending back. They are also split at the band. The effect is separated hair. The coil groomer was the most difficult to use. No matter how much I twisted it, I could only get a hair or two after a few tries. Tweezing was faster and more effective. I have a lot of small moles on my face, so I made sure to be extra careful while using them. Despite this, I managed to nick myself a few times. What's ironic is that the nicks weren't on any moles.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to show a strong interest in fashion accessories and skincare products, particularly those that enhance aesthetic appearance and personal care. Their recent interactions reveal an engagement with facial grooming tools, indicating a desire to maintain both skincare and overall appearance.

- **Quality Awareness:** The user remains highly discerning about product quality, emphasizing durability and effectiveness. Their assessment of a new grooming tool reflects their sensitivity to product performance on delicate skin, closely monitoring any adverse effects or outcomes.

- **Value Sensitivity:** Consistent dissatisfaction with perceived value for money persists, as the user seeks a balance between design, quality, and effectiveness across all purchases. This is evident in their thoughtful reviews and product comparisons.

- **Aesthetic Appreciation:** The user appreciates visually appealing products and is open to trying new tools that align with their aesthetic taste. However, they remain critical of their experiences, especially those that do not meet their expectations.

- **Practical Use:** Practicality continues to be a priority; the user favors functional and comfortable solutions for everyday grooming. Their latest experience underscores their preference for gentle options that accommodate sensitive skin while delivering noticeable results.

Overall, the user values stylish and effective options, maintaining a discerning perspective on quality, durability, and practical application in both fashion and skincare categories.
